funding-group.funding-statement: The work done at the Crick Worldwide Influenza Centre, a WHO Collaborating Centre for Reference and Research on Influenza, was supported by the Francis Crick Institute, which receives its core funding from Cancer Research UK (FC001030), the Medical Research Council (FC001030) and the Wellcome Trust (FC001030). The influenza surveillance in Mozambique is supported by the Centre for Disease Control and Prevention (Grant # U51IP000825) and by the World Health Organization (WHO). The funders had no role in the study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
